_sText: Map by Jack.

Original thread of first version of this map:
http://plaguefest.com/threads/zm_winter_escape_qr_v1.20907/

Map Description

  • ze_winter_helicopter is a warehouse-themed map.
  • Old version was not that good, so this is a remake.
  • This map is inspired by ATIX panic.
  • This map combines both ZM aspects (barricading), and ZE aspects (escaping).
  • It has 64 player spawns, some spots to barricade, or to hold.

Building Structure

  • There are 8 rooms (barricading or defending spot) that humans can choose.
  • Each room has an escape door that opens after a certain amount of time, like ATIX Panic, and it serves as a path to the roof.
  • There are 2 levels of roof, the taller roof and lower roof. The taller roof is the part of the roof that has the staircase to the helicopter. The lower roof is the part of the roof has a ladder that can be accessed by humans in the beginning of the round. So, it can act as a defending spot too.

Gameplay Flow

Humans
  • Humans start by picking rooms to defend/barricade for a certain amount of time.
  • After that certain amount of time, the escape door opens. Humans have 30 seconds to escape to the taller roof.
  • Humans must defend the taller roof from two different entry points: the staircase they used, and the lower roof, for a specified amount of time.
  • Humans must be careful to not get too close with zombies' special teleport spot. (It is slightly visible in the screenshot, but everyone can clearly see it in-game)
  • After that specified amount of time, the humans can enter the helicopter and prepare last 20 seconds defense before the helicopter departs.
  • Helicopter departs, human wins.

Zombies
  • Attack humans in the barricading/defending spot.
  • After the escape door opens, zombies can try to enter the building through another entrance (behind the helicopter pillar).
  • Zombies now must attack humans in the taller roof. They can rush to the entry point, or just use the secret teleport hidden somewhere in the map.

Changelog (v1 to v2)

  • The entire map layout is completely different. Rather than lila panic-like buildings, I made a whole new building structure.
  • Barricading & defending spots are completely different.
  • There are no more teleports in the helicopter, but there are secret teleporters to the roof for zombies.
  • Helicopter has been changed, I decided to use the prefab made by AuroraF: https://gamebanana.com/prefabs/2742

If there are bugs in the map, please notify me and i'll try to fix it.

_aChangeLog.text: Added 3 zm items, added/changed plenty of stuff.

_sText:
ze_Winter_Bash_v2


  • Zombie escape map with 4 completely different levels + 1 zm level at the end.
  • Map contains few boss fights and 2 of them are regular (moving ones based on triggers and thrusters) and 1 static. Bosses have dynamic hp (more players = more hp).
  • 5 special human items and 3 zombie items.Â 
  • Radio secret at spawn.
Map may contain bugs, so if you find one let me know.

Version 1.1 of Warped is out!

FEATURES
==================

- Random pathways! There are two paths that are picked randomly each round so this map will always keep you on your toes.

- Teamwork! Some defense points require splitting up, but holding the choke point is crucial as well. Work together to overcome these obstacles.

- Hidden secrets! Locate the hidden chainsaws that damage & push zombies, or the radio which can add some fun music to the map.

### Final Note

- I had a lot of fun making Warped, and plan on doing more ZE maps in the future.
- Feel free to use this map on your servers, credit is already given in the map to me.

V1_1
==================
Major glitches (spike trap) removed from game.
Elevator now properly kills blocking players.

IMPORTANT!!: its important that the zombies are selected before the humans are teleported into the level itself. i would recommend having it being selected right away with in 5 seconds or so. this is no problem cause the zombies will be sorted from the humans and therefore cant harm them until players are teleported to the map. if zombies dont spawn early enough humans will only have a few seconds to barricade and it will most likely result in the zombies will win. yes the humans are supposed to barricade this is a mix of zombie escape and zombie survival. the humans will have to survive on 3 different islands each for 2 minutes. after the humans have survived on an island for 2 minutes the entrance to the next island will open and humans run to the next island. meanwhile the zombies are trapped for an amount of time before released again giving the humans a change to escape the island once all 3 islands are complete an escape route will open which the humans have to escape and then they will be teleportated to heaven while those who didnt make it will be nuked (WTFBOOM nuked of course :D) this map has been tested on the icannt ultimate zombie reloaded server and meanwhile testing its final beta version it managed to attract 61/64 players therefore the server was listed as: 1) Oz CSS Overall Rank: National No.1 2) World Zombie Overall Rank: World No.1 3) World CSS Overall Rank: World No.4 :D :D for evidence goto: http://www.zombiesfromhell.net/forum/3-1030-1 how to play this map is also explained ingame with console commands this also contains a soundtrack ive made myself for the map ^^ please comment and assess :D changes in v2: fixed bug where if you spawned late as human you would be trapped in spwanpoint area removed some bushes to make for better framerate changes in fix: removed a misplaced spawnpoint changes in v3 made too early zombie spawning impossible made a "force field" on the 3rd island so that when you fall off it teleports your back up. fixed that you could be shot out of the map made the end teleporting spot bigger so that humans have a better change changes in v4 map has been optimized with help from freeZe :) some graphical changes time on each island has been shortened to 1 min and 30 seconds penalty teleporters has been fixed and has been added to each island changes in v5 fixed 2nd cage changes in v6 draw distance decreased for better fps changes in v7 finnaly solved the lag on 3rd island :) (kinda) cause im still not sure what cause dit but its gone now :) added a trophies wall in heaven to spray on once you get there :P made that the teleporter that teleports you to haven only teleports humans which will make it easier to win :) Changes in v8 some graphical changes that the css update smashed! a few gameplay changes. mostly spot modifications and an extra box in the endzone changed a few more textures and lights optimised the map so the 3rd island is only visible when you are on it and you cant see the other islands from it changes in v8_1 fixed missing texture changes in v8_3 various graphic fixes removed spawn chambers which make the ballance apply better for each server escape route to hells vackground has been redone the floating boxes have been adjusted to be easier changes in v8_5 fixed !ztele bug

STORY:
An expierement in a city didn't work out very well.
It's is now infected by zombies.
The US goverment isn't happy with that and is 1 phonecall away of sending the US army.
Your mission as human is to escape from the abandoned city and get to the tv station. There, you call the US army and hide yourself with your teammates in the bunker and wait there while the army is bombing the city


Features:

- 64 Spawnplaces
- 2 Escape Trucks
- 2 Escape Boats
- 2 Working Radio's
- Secrets
- Moving Truck

Westsider ( mapper )

Gargantua ( feedback )
i3D.net ( support )
Deeway (uploading the map to i3d servers)

map is now has more paths and is easier for cts/humans. map is also a lot shorter per round. 3-4 mins average per round.
Version 2 of turokbase 2. enjoy

This is the 2nd turokbase map. i spent a lot more time and used a lot of the things i learned from the last map. i plan on updating the first one later on.


STORY -

The terror isn't over as it seems both a group survivors and a single trace of the zombie horde lived though the destruction of the base. With most parts of the complex destroyed, the humans must dive deeper into the lower restricted levels in search of way to escape alive.

---


this map is marked as the beta version since this is the first submission.

Greetings.

I come to thee with a new map after 2 years of procrastination!

I usually create maps for games I'm playing at the time, and currently I've been playing a lot of CSS:ZE.
What shocked me was the horribly unbalanced maps, leaning to the favour of the survivors, with countless of blockades for the zombies. So I took it to my personal mission to create a map that leans to the favour of the zombies.

Survivors have a few hold-positions after which they can continue with the escape again. The timers for survivors are long, but for the zombies very brief. This is to ensure that the zombies get enough chances to attempt infecting the survivors, and the survivors won't get too big head starts at each blockade.

The map takes the player from a trainstation to a trainyard, from there through sewers to a canal. From a water-powered laboratory to another and from there to the allyes of a small town, and it all climaxes into venturing to a dark catacomb - WATCH OUT FOR THE SUN!!

Reviews and constructive comments are more than welcome! I'd be happy to alter the map and make more versions to satisfy your needs whether it was tweaking a scene or extending the map, just share your ideas!

I'd also appreciate if you posted IPs for servers that are running the map.

ze_trainescape_final

Originally created and developed by:
Archanor & DaReDeViL (toMMMMM)

Remade for zombie mod by:
.ÃÂ£cho

Fixed by:
Jens & Krusty


I've changed gameplay to suit zombie escape. There are now three main routes for escape plus one secret route to helicopter. Your goal is to reach train station, survive there for one minute and leave the city. Nuke has been remade and affects entire area now, excluding room with nuke button. Map has been also optimized, so there shouldn't be any lags.

ZE_TRAINESCAPE_B3 Originally Created and Developed By: Archanor & DaReDeViL (zombie_trainescape_b2) Number of Spawn Points: 64 Recommended Player Count: 24-32 So I've heard great things about zombie_trainescape from my Zombie Horde-fanatic friends, and figured it was time to introduce a proper ZombieMod version. All credit for the map goes to Archanor & DaReDeViL. All I've done have reworked the spawn points, starting area, and starting weapons to better fit ZM. The terrorists now spawn outside the pods, there's no more "killer gas", and you start with a knife and p228 to get you started until you can reach the weapons area. Gameplay has been tested, and besides these changes, everything is authentic. Please thank the creators for such a good map and keep in mind that any comments and/or assessments should be for the map itself, and not my changes. This is their map, after all. The following changes have been made to this new release: - Ladders in sewer system have been fixed. - Outside secret ladder has been fixed. - Exit to generator room has been made secure with a catwalk, so those coming out of it won't die from zombies instantly and actually have a good chance of surviving, even with zombies on the train flatbeds. - Added new safety barricades and fences at the train station to ensure that humans stand a chance against any zombies at that point. - Attempted to fix any problems when riding the train, like randomly getting stuck on others, strange glitches, and random deaths. No guarantees though, as I didn't try too hard to fix the problem. You've got to remember this is a beta release we're talking about, people. There's bound to be problems I simply can't fix without looking further into the problem. Thank you for reporting it, though. - Added buildings and areas to take cover in when the train leaves and when the nuke has gone off in case there are remaining zombies on the train somehow. - Added further optimization for less lag and better FPS. - Fixed the strange and rare p228 and knife starting weapons error. I will not be adding a buyzone, ever. I've tested it this way, and it has proven not to work. p228's have a good firepower-to-practicality ratio that makes them perfect in escape maps of this type. - Fixed minor graphical glitches. - Fixed minor gameplay glitches. Remember, to get the train started, you've got to start all 4 generators. Hope to see this map on some ZM servers soon enough. Thanks and enjoy! =D Regards, Â£cho Official FPSBanana ZombieMod Representative

The terrorists now spawn outside the pods, there's no more "killer gas", and you start with a knife and p228 to get you started until you can reach the weapons area. Gameplay has been tested, and besides these changes, everything is authentic. Edits: Uploaded new file, Final version
Map is abouts 2x more longer now, deleted 1 of traps, made traps more balanced, and some other things too.
Those are old pictures, i add more soon.

MAP FEATURES

  • 64 players
  • Randomized paths, missions and endings. Creating a more random and dynamic experience
  • A boss. The "Ermah-toast" which runs after the players, killing them.
  • 5 different items, easy to use

The layout can be confusing for new players but you'll learn the layout with time. Follow the arrows! They are always right.

VERSION CHANGES V1 (initial port)

  • Music replaced with lots of other soundtracks
  • Healthbar implemented for the boss
  • Props has been re-located/replaced
  • Texturing changed to work with CS:S
  • Custom particles added

VERSION CHANGES V1_1

  • fixed some major issues that made the map unfinishable at times
  • fixed/replaced some textures
  • reduced time on holds in order to avoid going over the timelimit
  • improved some teleporter triggers
  • buffed and improved the boss, added an additional attack
  • improved the initial climb, made it faster to get up
  • added 5 different items (which are able to damage the boss)
  • fixed a crash by replacing a particle with a custom one
  • added/improved custom particles
  • added additional console messages
  • improved some holds
  • made the elevator go faster

VERSION CHANGES V1_2

  • fixed a major issue where zombies got teleported infront of the humans
  • fixed some slight visual glitches
  • tweaked some outputs and output timings
  • locked the elevator during the "core" escape, so people wouldn't go down in confusion
  • brought out some arrows to make it even clearer where to go
  • nerfed the items slightly
  • improved the boss physics and movements, to avoid getting stuck in walls and weapons

Zombie Escape in a mysterious town.

When the humans run into a town to hide at a house from the zombies, they find that theres more to that town than they can see.

Map Features 3 random endings: Train. Bunker. Airfield

V1 CHANGELOG:

  • Edited some of the holds
  • TRIED to optimize the map a bit more.
  • Zombies SHOULDN'T be able to knife through the elevator floors/ceilings.
Report any bugs or whatever you may encounter here.

Install:

Upload this map to your servers map directory. And add the name to maplist.txt, mapcycle.txt  etc
The same as you would to any other map.


Notes:

This map is created for Zombie Escape. It will work on normal zombie servers, and allow the humans to escape in the same manner.
If any errors are found, email me at overclocked89@hotmail.co.uk
Enjoy

#Version:
Version 1_2

#Map for:
Counter Strike Source - Zombie Escape

#Map Time:
Map is set for 8minutes

#Max Players:
64 (34 cts/30ts)

#Known Issues:
Can see Reaper Splitter Boss Arm Bones

#Additions:
Reaper boss cannot be hurt until he appears.
Reaper boss has +750 for every CT in the boss room.
Each Ct Killed by Reaper Boss, Boss -250hp.
Extra 3 way defence room, 40 Second Hold.
Reaper splitter targets players instead of following a path.
Few level tweaks 
Extra Hold
New boss health system

#Fixes:
CT's can hide in the corner and avoid the boss.
Being able to ride on top of the reaper splitters head.
Reaper Boss Movement.
Reaper Boss Targets T's
Tweaked platform at spawn to help stop edgers


#Future Additions and Fixes:
As of yet to decide, currently working on new map

#Important Notes:
You must have noblock mod installed on your server to play this map otherwise you will have serious problems with player teleports. USE NADES ON THE BOSS IT WILL HELP LOL

Mononoke - Stephends
